thread.title: Anthony Mackie Unendorses Donald Trump, Claims He Was Just Kidding

author: wn.com
title: Anthony Mackie Unendorses Donald Trump, Claims He Was Just Kidding
text: Actor Anthony Mackie has backpedaled on his endorsement of Donald Trump for president after a huge backlash on social media. He now claims the endorsement which blew up Twitter was all just a joke, a bad one at that. The Captain America and Avengers star abruptly jumped off the the GOP front-runnerâ€™s bandwagon after his...
